name: Weedle

attacks.name: Multiply
attacks.effect: Put 1 random Weedle from your deck onto your Bench.

description:
Often found in forests and grasslands.
It has a sharp, toxic barb of around two inches
on top of its head.

name: Kakuna

attacks.name: String Shot
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

description:
Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon can only
harden its shell to protect itself when it is
in danger.

attacks.name: Crushing Spear
attacks.effect: Discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Pinsir

attacks.name: Guillotine Rush
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 40 more damage for each heads.

description:
These Pokémon judge one another based on
pincers. Thicker, more impressive pincers make
for more popularity with the opposite gender.

name: Sprigatito

attacks.name: Cry for Help
attacks.effect: Put 1 random [G] Pokémon from your deck into your hand.

description:
Its fluffy fur is similar in composition to plants.
This Pokémon frequently washes its face to keep
it from drying out.

name: Floragato
description:
Floragato deftly wields the vine hidden beneath
its long fur, slamming the hard flower bud against
its opponents.

name: Meowscarada

attacks.name: Fighting Claws
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon ex, this attack does 70 more damage.

description:
This Pokémon uses the reflective fur lining its
cape to camouflage the stem of its flower,
creating the illusion that the flower is floating.

name: Charmander
description:
It has a preference for hot things. When it rains,
steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

name: Charmeleon
description:
It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its
fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.

attacks.name: Stoke
attacks.effect: Take 3 [R] Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

name: Magmar
description:
Magmar dispatches its prey with fire. But it
regrets this habit once it realizes that it has
burned its intended prey to a charred crisp.

name: Magmortar

attacks.name: Smoke Bomb
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, if the Defending Pokémon tries to use an attack, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack doesn't happen.

description:
When Magmortar inhales deeply, the fire burning
in its belly intensifies, rising in temperature to
over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Paldean Tauros

attacks.name: Blaze Tackle
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 10 damage to itself.

description:
When heated by fire energy, its horns can get
hotter than 1,800 degrees Fahrenheit. Those
gored by them will suffer both wounds and burns.

name: Tentacool
description:
Tentacool is not a particularly strong swimmer.
It drifts across the surface of shallow seas as it
searches for prey.

name: Tentacruel
description:
When the red orbs on Tentacruel’s head glow
brightly, watch out. The Pokémon is about to
fire off a burst of ultrasonic waves.

name: Buizel
description:
It inflates its flotation sac, keeping its face above
water in order to watch for prey movement.

name: Floatzel

attacks.name: Water Arrow
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

description:
With its flotation sac inflated, it can carry people
on its back. It deflates the sac before it dives.

name: Wiglett

attacks.name: Spring Out
attacks.effect: 1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen at random. Do 30 damage to it.

description:
This Pokémon can pick up the scent of a Veluza
just over 65 feet away and will hide itself in
the sand.

attacks.name: Pop Out Throughout
attacks.effect: 1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen at random 3 times. For each time a Pokémon was chosen, do 50 damage to it.

name: Dondozo

attacks.name: Ocean Cyclone
attacks.effect: This attack also does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

description:
This Pokémon is a glutton, but it’s bad at getting
food. It teams up with a Tatsugiri to catch prey.

name: Tatsugiri

ability.title: Retreat Directive
ability.effect: Your Active Dondozo has no Retreat Cost.

description:
This is a small dragon Pokémon. It lives inside the
mouth of Dondozo to protect itself from enemies
on the outside.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Voltorb
description:
It rolls to move. If the ground is uneven, a sudden
jolt from hitting a bump can cause it to explode.

name: Electrode

attacks.name: Tumbling Attack
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

description:
The more energy it charges up, the faster
it gets. But this also makes it more likely
to explode.

name: Pachirisu

attacks.name: Plasma
attacks.effect: Take a [L] Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Benched [L] Pokémon.

description:
It’s one of the kinds of Pokémon with electric
cheek pouches. It shoots charges from its tail.

name: Pawmi
description:
It has underdeveloped electric sacs on its cheeks.
These sacs can produce electricity only if Pawmi
rubs them furiously with the pads on its forepaws.

name: Pawmo
description:
When its group is attacked, Pawmo is the first
to leap into battle, defeating enemies with a
fighting technique that utilizes electric shocks.

name: Pawmot

ability.title: Counterattack
ability.effect: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon, do 20 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

description:
This Pokémon normally is slow to react, but once
it enters battle, it will strike down its enemies
with lightning-fast movements.

name: Abra
description:
This Pokémon uses its psychic powers while it
sleeps. The contents of Abra’s dreams affect the
powers that the Pokémon wields.

name: Kadabra
description:
Using its psychic power, Kadabra levitates as it
sleeps. It uses its springy tail as a pillow.

name: Alakazam

attacks.name: Psychic Suppression
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has any Energy attached.

description:
It has an incredibly high level of intelligence.
Some say that Alakazam remembers everything
that ever happens to it, from birth till death.

name: Mr. Mime

attacks.name: Juggling
attacks.effect: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

description:
The broadness of its hands may be no
coincidence—many scientists believe its palms
became enlarged specifically for pantomiming.

name: Drifloon
description:
It is whispered that any child who mistakes
Drifloon for a balloon and holds on to it could
wind up missing.

name: Drifblim
description:
It can generate and release gas within its body.
That’s how it can control the altitude of its drift.

ability.title: Broken-Space Bellow
ability.effect: Once during your turn, you may take a [P] Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon. If you use this Ability, your turn ends.

attacks.name: Chaotic Impact
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

name: Gimmighoul

attacks.name: Chest-ouflage
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.

description:
This Pokémon was born inside a treasure chest
about 1,500 years ago. It sucks the life-force
out of scoundrels who try to steal the treasure.

name: Machop
description:
Its whole body is composed of muscles.
Even though it’s the size of a human child, it can
hurl 100 grown-ups.

name: Machoke

attacks.name: Pummel
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

description:
Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a
power-save belt to be able to regulate
its motions.

name: Machamp

attacks.name: Power Press
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has at least 2 extra [F] Energy attached, this attack does 50 more damage.

description:
It quickly swings its four arms to rock its
opponents with ceaseless punches and chops
from all angles.

name: Hitmonlee
description:
This amazing Pokémon has an awesome sense of
balance. It can kick in succession from any position.

name: Hitmonchan
description:
Its punches slice the air. They are launched at
such high speed, even a slight graze could cause
a burn.

name: Riolu
description:
They communicate with one another using their
auras. They are able to run all through the night.

attacks.name: Aura Sphere
attacks.effect: This attack also does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Flamigo

attacks.name: Double Kick
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.

description:
This Pokémon apparently ties the base of its neck
into a knot so that energy stored in its belly does
not escape from its beak.

name: Ekans
description:
By dislocating its jaw, it can swallow prey larger
than itself. After a meal, it curls up and rests.

name: Arbok

attacks.name: Venomous Fang
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

description:
After stunning its opponents with the pattern
on its stomach, it quickly wraps them up in its
body and waits for them to stop moving.

name: Paldean Wooper

attacks.name: Poison Jab
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

description:
After losing a territorial struggle, Wooper began
living on land. The Pokémon changed over time,
developing a poisonous film to protect its body.

attacks.name: Venoshock
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is Poisoned, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Spiritomb

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

description:
Its constant mischief and misdeeds resulted
in it being bound to an Odd Keystone by a
mysterious spell.

name: Shroodle
description:
Though usually a mellow Pokémon, it will sink its
sharp, poison-soaked front teeth into any that
anger it, causing paralysis in the object of its ire.

name: Grafaiai

ability.title: Poison Coating
ability.effect: Once during your turn, you may flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

description:
The color of the poisonous saliva depends on
what the Pokémon eats. Grafaiai covers its fingers
in its saliva and draws patterns on trees in forests.

name: Tinkatink
description:
It swings its handmade hammer around to protect
itself, but the hammer is often stolen by Pokémon
that eat metal.

name: Tinkatuff

attacks.name: Tenacious Hammer
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

description:
This Pokémon will attack groups of Pawniard and
Bisharp, gathering metal from them in order to
create a large and sturdy hammer.

attacks.name: Terrific Thumping
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 80 more damage.

name: Varoom
description:
It is said that this Pokémon was born when an
unknown poison Pokémon entered and inspirited
an engine left at a scrap-processing factory.

name: Revavroom

attacks.name: Spinning Drift
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage from—and effects of—attacks done to this Pokémon.

description:
It creates a gas out of poison and minerals from
rocks. It then detonates the gas in its cylinders—
now numbering eight—to generate energy.

name: Gholdengo

attacks.name: Scintillating Surfing
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each [M] Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 50 damage for each heads.

description:
Its body seems to be made up of 1,000 coins.
This Pokémon gets along well with others and is
quick to make friends with anybody.

name: Rattata
description:
Its incisors grow continuously throughout its life.
If its incisors get too long, this Pokémon
becomes unable to eat, and it starves to death.

name: Raticate
description:
People say that it fled from its enemies by
using its small webbed hind feet to swim
from island to island in Alola.

name: Jigglypuff
description:
It hugely inflates its stomach and sings a
mysterious melody. If you hear this melody,
you’ll become sleepy right away.

name: Wigglytuff

ability.title: Comforting Song
ability.effect: Once during your turn, you may heal 20 damage from your Active Pokémon.

description:
It has a very fine fur. Take care not to make it
angry, or it may inflate steadily and hit with a
body slam.

name: Lickitung
description:
If this Pokémon’s sticky saliva gets on you and
you don’t clean it off, an intense itch will set in.
The itch won’t go away, either.

name: Lickilicky
description:
Lickilicky’s strange tongue can stretch to many
times the length of its body. No one has figured
out how Lickilicky’s tongue can stretch so far.

name: Bidoof
description:
With nerves of steel, nothing can perturb it. It is
more agile and active than it appears.

attacks.name: Carefree Press
attacks.effect: Heal 30 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Buneary
description:
If both of Buneary’s ears are rolled up, something
is wrong with its body or mind. It’s a sure sign the
Pokémon is in need of care.

name: Lopunny
description:
Lopunny is constantly monitoring its surroundings.
If danger approaches, this Pokémon responds
with superdestructive kicks.

name: Cyclizar

attacks.name: Overacceleration
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Overacceleration attack does +20 damage.

description:
Apparently Cyclizar has been allowing people to
ride on its back since ancient times. Depictions of
this have been found in 10,000-year-old murals.

name: Iono
effect: Each player shuffles the cards in their hand into their deck, then draws that many cards.

name: Pokémon Center Lady
effect: Heal 30 damage from 1 of your Pokémon, and it recovers from all Special Conditions.

name: Red
effect: During this turn, attacks used by your Pokémon do +20 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon ex.

name: Team Rocket Grunt
effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Meowscarada

attacks.name: Fighting Claws
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon ex, this attack does 70 more damage.

description:
This Pokémon uses the reflective fur lining its
cape to camouflage the stem of its flower,
creating the illusion that the flower is floating.

name: Buizel
description:
It inflates its flotation sac, keeping its face above
water in order to watch for prey movement.

name: Tatsugiri

ability.title: Retreat Directive
ability.effect: Your Active Dondozo has no Retreat Cost.

description:
This is a small dragon Pokémon. It lives inside the
mouth of Dondozo to protect itself from enemies
on the outside.

ability.title: Poison Coating
ability.effect: Once during your turn, you may flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

what the Pokémon eats. Grafaiai covers its fingers
in its saliva and draws patterns on trees in forests.

quick to make friends with anybody.

ability.effect: Once during your turn, you may heal 20 damage from your Active Pokémon.

angry, or it may inflate steadily and hit with a
body slam.

attacks.effect: Discard a random Energy from your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.effect: Take 3 [R] Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

attacks.effect: 1 of your opponent's Pokémon is chosen at random 3 times. For each time a Pokémon was chosen, do 50 damage to it.

attacks.effect: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon.

ability.effect: Once during your turn, you may take a [P] Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon. If you use this Ability, your turn ends.

attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

name: Poké Ball
effect: Put 1 random Basic Pokemon from your deck into your hand.
